```javascript
var scope = 'global';
function f(){
    console.log(scope);
    var scope = 'local';
    console.log('scope');
}
```

```javascript
var scope = 'global';
function f(){
    var scope;    //
    console.log(scope);
    scope = 'local';    //
    console.log(scope);
}
```

```javascript
baz.bar();    //2 foo()a
```

## 1

## 2
JavaScript
```javascript
function createFunctions(){
	var result = new Array();
	for(var i = 0; i< 10; i ++){
		result[i] = function(){
			return i;
		}
	}
	return result;
}
console.log(createFunctions()[1]());    //1010
```
10
createFunctions()icreateFunctions()i10ii10

```javascript
function createFunctions() {
    var result = new Array();
    for (var i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
        result[i] = function(num) {
            return function(){
            	return num;
            };
        }(i);
    }
    return result;
}
```
inumresultnum
## 3this
`this``this``window`'this''window'
```javascript
var name = 'The window';
var object = {
    name: 'My Object',
    getNameFunc: function() {
        return function() {
            return this.name;
        }
    }
}
console.log(object.getNameFunc()()); //The window
```
```javascript
var name = 'The window';
var object = {
    name: 'My Object',
    getNameFunc: function() {
        var self = this;
        return function() {
            return self.name;
        }
    }
}
console.log(object.getNameFunc()()); //My Object
```

# 

```javascript
    function fun(n, o) {
        console.log(o);
        return {
            fun: function(m) {
                return fun(m, n);
            }
        };
    }
var a = fun(0);  a.fun(1);  a.fun(2);  a.fun(3);//undefined,?,?,?
var b = fun(0).fun(1).fun(2).fun(3);//undefined,?,?,?
var c = fun(0).fun(1);  c.fun(2);  c.fun(3);//undefined,?,?,?
abc
```

## `cnzz_tongji.ejs`
`themes/yilia/layout/_partial/``cnzz_tongji.ejs`:

```ejs
	</script>
<%}%>
```

```bash
git remote add origin <git repository url>

```
## 4push

```bash
git add *
git commit -m 'message'
git push origin source 
```

Post.title: HexoHexo
Post._content:
Hexo

<!-- more -->
Hexogithub
:`d:\hexo\_config.yml`:`d:\hexo\themes\yilia\_config.yml`
## 
```yml
# Hexo Configuration
## Docs: https://hexo.io/docs/configuration.html
## Source: https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/

# Site
title: Superman #
subtitle:  #
description:  #
author: Superman 
email: supermanchc@gmail.com
language: zh-Hans #  zh-Hans
timezone:  #

# URL
## If your site is put in a subdirectory, set url as 'http://yoursite.com/child' and root as '/child/'
##url 
url: http://yoursite.com
root: /
permalink: :year/:month/:day/:title/
permalink_defaults:

# Directory 
source_dir: source
public_dir: public
tag_dir: tags
archive_dir: archives
category_dir: categories
code_dir: downloads/code
i18n_dir: :lang
skip_render:

# Writing 
new_post_name: :title.md # File name of new posts
default_layout: post
titlecase: false # Transform title into titlecase
external_link: true # Open external links in new tab
filename_case: 0
render_drafts: false
post_asset_folder: false
relative_link: false
future: true
highlight:
  enable: true
  line_number: true
  auto_detect: false
  tab_replace:

# Category & Tag
default_category: uncategorized
category_map:
tag_map:
# Archives 21
## 2: Enable pagination
## 1: Disable pagination
## 0: Fully Disable
archive: 1
category: 1
tag: 1
# Date / Time format
## Hexo uses Moment.js to parse and display date
## You can customize the date format as defined in
## http://momentjs.com/docs/#/displaying/format/
date_format: YYYY-MM-DD
time_format: HH:mm:ss

# Pagination
## Set per_page to 0 to disable pagination
per_page: 5
pagination_dir: page

# Extensions 
## Plugins: https://hexo.io/plugins/
## Themes: https://hexo.io/themes/
theme: yilia

# Deployment githubgithub repository
## Docs: https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html
deploy:
  type: git
  repository: https://github.com/superman66/superman66.github.io.git
  branch: master
```
## 
Hexo[](https://github.com/tommy351/hexo/wiki/Themes)`yilia`
#### 

``` bash
$ git clone https://github.com/litten/hexo-theme-yilia.git themes/yilia
```

#### 

hexo `_config.yml` themes: 
```yml
# Extensions 
## Plugins: https://hexo.io/plugins/
## Themes: https://hexo.io/themes/
theme: yilia
```

#### 

``` bash
cd themes/yilia
git pull
```
## 

`_config.yml`
```
# Header
menu:
  : /
  : /archives
  # : /tags/

# SubNav
subnav:
  github: "#"
  weibo: "#"
  rss: "#"
  zhihu: "#"
  #douban: "#"
  #mail: "#"
  #facebook: "#"
  #google: "#"
  #twitter: "#"
  #linkedin: "#"

rss: /atom.xml

# Content
excerpt_link: more
fancybox: true
mathjax: true

# Miscellaneous
google_analytics: ''
favicon: /favicon.png

#url
avatar: ""
#
share: true
# duoshuo: duoshuo-key
#disqusconfigdisqus_shortname
duoshuo: true
#
tagcloud: true

#
#
#friends: false
#
friends:
  : http://localhost:4000/
  : http://localhost:4000/
  : http://localhost:4000/
  : http://localhost:4000/
  : http://localhost:4000/
  : http://localhost:4000/

#
#
#aboutme: false
#
aboutme: 
```

```yml
# Hexo Configuration

# Site
title: Superman #

# URL
## If your site is put in a subdirectory, set url as 'http://yoursite.com/child' and root as '/child/'
##url

root: /
permalink: :year/:month/:day/:title/
permalink_defaults:

# Directory 
source_dir: source
public_dir: public
tag_dir: tags
archive_dir: archives
category_dir: categories
code_dir: downloads/code

# Writing

titlecase: false # Transform title into titlecase

filename_case: 0
```

# Hexo

# Hexo 
windows
## 
Hexo
* Node.js
* Git

##  Git
[msysgit](https://git-for-windows.github.io/)
##  Nodejs
windowsnodejs[](https://nodejs.org/)
##  Hexo
HexoGitNode.jsnpm
```bash
npm install -g hexo-cli
```
## Hexo
`D:\hexo`,`git bash`,
```bash
hexo init
```
## 
```bash
npm install
```
## 
Hexo
### 
```bash
hexo generate
```
### 
```bash
hexo server
```
`localhost:4000`

# Github
## Github
[](https://github.com/)
##  repository
github `New repository`,repository
repositorygithubgithub`superman66`
repository`superman66.github.io`
## 
(`D:\hexo`)_config.yml`superman66`
```
deploy:
  type: git
  repository: https://github.com/superman66/superman66.github.io.git
  branch: master
```
*hexo 3.0type `github`*


```bash
hexo generate
hexo deploy
```

### hexo
* `hexo new "post_name"`
* `hexo generate`
* `hexo server` 
* `hexo deploy`repository


 `hexo g` === `hexo generate`
 `hexo s` === `hexo server`
 `hexo d` === `hexo deploy`
 `hexo n` === `hexo new`
 githubusername.github.io(`username`) 

 ## 
 `hexo d`
 **`hexo bash: /dev/tty: No such device or address`**

 github for Window[](https://github-windows.s3.amazonaws.com/GitHubSetup.exe),git shell`hexo d`

---
title: AngularJS
date: 2016-02-24 22:23:54
tags: 
- AngularJS
- 
---
AngularJSCSSJavaScriptJSocLazyLoad
<!-- more -->
AngularJS[ocLazyLoad](https://oclazyload.readme.io/docs)ocLazyLoadAngularJS`module``service``directive`
### ocLazyLoad
npmbower
```bash
npm install oclazyload
bower install oclazyload
```
### `ocLazyLoad` module 
```javascript
angular.module('myApp',['oc.lazyLoad']);
```
###  `ocLazyLoad`
 `config` `$ocLazyLoadProvider`,
```bash
.config(['$ocLazyLoadProvider', function($ocLazyLoadProvider){
    $ocLazyLoadProvider.config({
        debug: true,
        events: true,
        modules: [
            {
                name: 'TestModule',
                files: ['test.js']
            }
        ]
    })
}])
```
* debug: debugfalsedebug$ocLazyLoadconsole
* eventsmodule$ocLazyLoadfalse
* modules
modules****files****

### module
```bash
    .config(['$routeProvider', function($routeProvider) {
        $routeProvider.otherwise('/index');
        $routeProvider.when('/index', {
            templateUrl: 'index.html',
            controller: 'IndexController',
            resolve: { //  resolve  promiseresolveview
                loadMyCtrl: ['$ocLazyLoad', function($ocLazyLoad) {
                    // modules
                    return $ocLazyLoad.load('TestModule'); //TestModule
                    /*return $ocLazyLoad.load([   // module
                        'TestModule',
                        'MainModule'
                        ]);*/
                }]
            }
        })
    }])
```
resolveControllerresolvepromise$routeChangeSuccess
**$ocLazyLoadhack**
`resolve`
* keythe value of key Controller
* factoryservice
resolvepromise

AngularJS$ocLazyLoadservicediretive[$ocLazyLoad](https://oclazyload.readme.io)

--- title: AngularJS date: 2016-04-04 16:45:39 tags: AngularJS --- AngularJS ## 1select angularHTML SELECT default valueoption `select option` ```javascript ``` ## 2AngularJSIEXHRBug IEXHRXHR IEajax http://stackoverflow.com/questions/16098430/angular-ie-caching-issue-for-http ```javascript myModule.config(['$httpProvider', function($httpProvider) { //initialize get if not there if (!$httpProvider.defaults.headers.get) { $httpProvider.defaults.headers.get = {}; } // Answer edited to include suggestions from comments // because previous version of code introduced browser-related errors //disable IE ajax request caching $httpProvider.defaults.headers.get['If-Modified-Since'] = 'Mon, 26 Jul 1997 05:00:00 GMT'; // extra $httpProvider.defaults.headers.get['Cache-Control'] = 'no-cache'; $httpProvider.defaults.headers.get['Pragma'] = 'no-cache';}]); ``` ## 3ui-bootstrap$modal :`$modal` `$timeout`100ms`$modal` ```javascript $timeout(function () { if($scope.isDated){ $modal.open({ backdrop: 'static', keyboard: false, animation: true, templateUrl: 'activity_reward_dated_modal.html', controller: 'ActivityRewardDatedModalCtrl' }); } },100) ``` ## 4 ### 1{{express}} JavaScriptDOMDOM ReadyAngularJSDOM ReadyAngularJS ### 2 * {{express}}ng-bindng-bindhtml ```
